issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] ParquetTable should avoid scanning all files twice
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11047](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11047). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ParquetTable currently reads the metadata for all files once in the constructor in order to get the schema, and does it again each time scan() is called.

We could read the metadata once and cache it instead.
